meanings.sent1: Not having an umbrella will necessitate finding shelter when it rains.
meanings.sent2: Studying hard will necessitate good grades in school.
meanings.sent3: Forgetting your lunch at home will necessitate a creative solution.
meanings.sent4: His reckless driving necessitated a serious conversation about safety.
meanings.sent5: The broken lock necessitated a quick repair to secure the house.

meanings.sent1: The new law will necessitate stricter regulations for businesses.
meanings.sent2: The doctor's orders necessitate taking the medication daily.
meanings.sent3: His loud snoring necessitated separate bedrooms for the couple.
meanings.sent4: The unexpected snowstorm necessitated a change of plans for the picnic.
meanings.sent5: Her absence from the meeting necessitated a delay in the decision-making process.

meanings.definition: To involve as a necessary condition
meanings.sent1: Being on time will necessitate catching the early bus.
meanings.sent2: The project's success necessitates teamwork and collaboration.
meanings.sent3: His love for spicy food necessitated carrying a bottle of water everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The fragile nature of the glass necessitated careful handling.
meanings.sent5: The complexity of the task necessitated detailed instructions for completion.
